member.name: P:LpjGuess.Runner.Models.RunSettings.JobName
member.summary: Name of the job.

member.name: P:LpjGuess.Runner.Models.RunSettings.FullFactorial
member.summary: Iff true, all combinations of parameters will be run.

member.name: P:LpjGuess.Runner.Models.RunSettings.Parameters
member.summary: Parameters to be passed to the model.

member.name: P:LpjGuess.Runner.Models.RunSettings.UseCpuAffinity
member.summary: True to use CPU affinity to pin each LPJ-Guess process to a single CPU (ie prevent context-switching of a guess process between CPUs). No effect on MacOS. Recommended: true.

member.name: M:LpjGuess.Runner.Models.RunSettings.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.UInt16,System.TimeSpan,System.UInt32,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a new instance.
member.param: Iff true, the run directory will be created but the job will not be submitted.
Iff true, the job will be run locally. Otherwise, it will be submitted to PBS.
Input module to be used by LPJ-Guess.
Number of CPUs to be allocated to the job.
Maximum walltime allowed for the job.
Amount of memory to be allocated to the job.
Queue to which the job shoudl be submitted.
PBS project under which the job should be submitted.
True to enable email notifications for the job, false otherwise.
Email address to be used for the job. Only used if emailNotifications is true.
Iff true, all combinations of parameters will be run.
True to use CPU affinity to pin each LPJ-Guess process to a single CPU (ie prevent context-switching of a guess process between CPUs). No effect on MacOS. Recommended: true.

member.name: M:LpjGuess.Runner.Models.RunSettings.Local(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.UInt16,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a new instance for local execution.
member.param: Input module to be used by LPJ-Guess.
Number of CPUs to be allocated to the job.
True to use CPU affinity to pin each LPJ-Guess process to a single CPU (ie prevent context-switching of a guess process between CPUs). No effect on MacOS. Recommended: true.
member.remarks: This is only necessary/useful because this class contains parameters for both local and remote runs, some of which are useful only in remote runs or vice versa. We should really refactor that abstraction out of this class, but for now, this serves as a convenience method to create a instance for local execution, accepting only parameters that are meaningful in that context.
